mapper.select:
SELECT CLASSNO, TESTCD, TESTNM FROM COM_TEST TB
ORDER BY CLASSNO, TESTCD
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_TEST(CLASSNO, TESTCD, TESTNM) VALUES (#{classno}, #{testcd}, #{testnm})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COM_TEST WHERE CLASSNO=#{classno} AND TESTCD=#{testcd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILETEST (CLASSNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (#{parentPK}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILETEST WHERE CLASSNO=#{classno} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILELIST (ID, SUBDIR, DEPTH, FILEFLAG, PARENTID, NAME, PARENTNAME) VALUES (#{id}, #{subDir}, #{depth}, #{fileflag}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{parentName})
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, DEPTH, FILEFLAG, PARENTID, ID FROM TBL_FILELIST WHERE CLASSNO=#{classno} ORDER BY ID ASC
